actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for construction of facilities on Guam.
short_title: Supplemental Authorization Act for Military Construction on Guam

summary.text: Supplemental Authorization Act for Military Construction on Guam - Title I: Military Construction - Authorizes appropriations for the establishment and development of military installations and facilities on Guam. Title II: Military Family Housing - Authorizes appropriations for military housing on Guam. Title III: General Provisions - Stipulates that authorizations under this Act shall be subject to the same authorizations and limitations of the Military Construction Authorization Act, 1976.

titles.title: Supplemental Authorization Act for Military Construction on Guam
A bill to authorize appropriations for construction of facilities on Guam.
